org.dict.zip.cli

クラス DictZipUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dict.zip.cli.DictZipUtils

  • public class DictZipUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class.

      Return file name for compressed output.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • uncompressedFileName

        protected static java.lang.String uncompressedFileName(java.lang.String name)
        Return filename that is good for uncompressed output.

        if input filename is not end with ".dz" or ".gz", adding ".~dz".

        パラメータ:
        name - input filename.
        戻り値:
        output filename.

      • compressedFileName

        protected static java.lang.String compressedFileName(java.lang.String name)
        Return file name for compressed output.
        パラメータ:
        name - input file name.
        戻り値:
        output filename.
